pullrequest.title: Upgrade to fuel-tools1 and automatically update paths -> pull request #2800

content.raw:
The user would only end up here if they're actively using the experimental feature, and this would only append paths, not affecting previous paths.

But fair enough, this can be changed after the release and shouldn't break ABI. I propose the change to v1 be made directly on pull request #2800 and leave this here for further review after the Gazebo 9 release.

I'll also point out I don't think this is the most elegant solution. For example, I think it would be much more maintainable if fuel knew how to look at every user subfolder under `~/.ignition/fuel/models`instead of needing to add each of them to the path.
